facet_1.name: Insensitive
facet_1.effects: Fervor grants bonus armor per stack while in Melee Form.

facet_2.name: Bad Influence
facet_2.effects: Unlocks max attack speed and removes the attack speed cap for Troll while Battle Trance is active. Additionally grants allied heroes bonus attack speed bonus while active. +2 Max Stacks

effects: The ranged Whirling Axes now dispel affected enemy units
The melee Whirling Axes now self-dispels
Grants a chance with additional chance per stack to throw a ranged-based instant attack at another enemy unit within the search radius

abilities.name: Battle Stance
abilities.description: Toggle Off swaps back to Ranged Form. Toggle On swaps to Melee Form. Reduces Troll's base attack time and base attack range in Melee Form.
abilities.details: Jah'rakal has a variety of ways to get under an enemy's skin.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Has a chance to block a flat amount of physical attack damage from other incoming attacks while in Melee Form.
abilities.details: The Troll's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities.

ability_1.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
ability_1.details: Hurls a fistful of axes in a cone shape over a distance, slowing and damaging enemy units.
ability_1.description: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
technical_details: Spawns 5 axes in front of Troll's facing angle which spread up to 25Â°
Each axe travels at 1500 projectile speed
Automatically toggles Battle Stance off and turns Troll into ranged form
interaction_notes: Has instant cast time while Battle Trance is active
Does not affect Roshan at all
Talent upgrade allows piercing debuff immunity

ability_2.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
ability_2.details: Hurls axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
technical_details: 2 axes travel out at 1250 speed and orbit clockwise while spiraling outward
Automatically toggles Battle Stance on and turns Troll into melee form
Applies basic dispel on Troll with Aghanim's Scepter
interaction_notes: Does not affect Roshan at all
Talent upgrade allows piercing debuff immunity

ability_3.name: Fervor
ability_3.details: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drops to nil.
ability_3.description: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.

facet_effects.insensitive: Grants bonus armor per stack while in Melee Form (1 armor per stack)
facet_effects.bad_influence: During Battle Trance, Fervor has increased max stacks (12 instead of 10)

technical_details: Max stacks: 10 (12 with Bad Influence facet during Battle Trance)
Attack speed bonus per stack: 15/20/25/30 (20/25/30/35 with talent)
Shard upgrade adds chance to throw ranged instant attack at another enemy
interaction_notes: Uses pseudo-random distribution for shard proc

ability_4.name: Berserker's Rage
ability_4.details: Grants different bonuses corresponding to the current Battle Stance.
ability_4.description: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
technical_details: Ranged Form: 20% chance to slow and deal bonus spell damage (10/15/20/25)
Melee Form: 14%/16%/18%/20% chance to root for 0.8/1.2/1.6/2 seconds
Melee Form grants armor bonus: 4/5/6/7 (13/14/15/16 with talent)
Melee Form grants move speed bonus: 15/25/35/45 (40/50/60/70 with talent)

ability_5.name: Battle Trance
ability_5.details: Unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces Troll to continuously attack the closest enemy unit, prioritizing heroes, within the radius. Grants Troll bonus lifesteal, bonus attack speed, and bonus movement speed.
ability_5.description: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.

facet_effects.bad_influence: Unlocks max attack speed and removes attack speed cap. Additionally grants allied heroes 70/85/100 attack speed globally.

technical_details: Health threshold: Cannot go below 1 HP
interaction_notes: Forces attack on closest enemy within 900 range
Does not consider Roshan as valid target
Talent allows casting while disabled and applies strong dispel

changes: Reduced Fervor Bad Influence max stacks bonus from 5 to 2
Increased Berserker's Rage melee form spell damage proc from 5/10/15/20 to 10/15/20/25
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Fervor no longer procs additional instant attacks when attacking Buildings or Ward-type units
